languages.text: "Страшился ли я? Да. Тоскую ли я о прошлом и смертных мыслях? Да. Самозаклание во славу божества и должно быть мучительно, ведь без боли невозможен катарсис, без жертвы не истинен апофеоз. Прости, я хотел бы ответить проще, но это можно лишь постичь самому".

"Was I afraid? I was. Have I missed the past and my mortal thoughts? I have. Self-sacrifice in the name of divinity must be agonisingly painful, for no catharsis is possible without pain, and no apotheosis is genuine without loss. Forgive me for not being able to put it in any simpler terms, much as I would like to — this is something one must experience in order to comprehend it."
languages.original_text: "Страшился ли я? Да. Тоскую ли я о прошлом и смертных мыслях? Да. Самозаклание во славу божества и должно быть мучительно, ведь без боли невозможен катарсис, без жертвы не истинен апофеоз. Прости, я хотел бы ответить проще, но это можно лишь постичь самому".

traits.locale_text: "Was I afraid? I was. Have I missed the past and my mortal thoughts? I have. Self-sacrifice in the name of divinity must be agonisingly painful; for no catharsis is possible without pain, and no apotheosis is genuine without loss. Forgive me for not being able to put it in any simpler terms, much as I would like to; this is something one must experience in order to comprehend it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Self-sacrifice in the name of divinity must be agonisingly painful, for no catharsis is possible without pain, and no apotheosis is genuine without loss. traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我害怕吗？我害怕。我是否怀念我的过去，怀念我身为凡人的思想？我怀念。以神性的名义进行的自我牺牲，一定会令人痛苦不已，因为没有痛苦就没有宣泄，没有失去就没有真正的登神。抱歉，虽然我很想说得尽可能简洁，但我没法用更加简洁的语言来描述这个过程。这件事情只有亲身经历，才能真正理解。”
languages.original_text: "Was I afraid? I was. Have I missed the past and my mortal thoughts? I have. Self-sacrifice in the name of divinity must be agonisingly painful, for no catharsis is possible without pain, and no apotheosis is genuine without loss. Forgive me for not being able to put it in any simpler terms, much as I would like to — this is something one must experience in order to comprehend it."

traits.locale_text: “我害怕吗？我害怕。我是否怀念我的过去，怀念我身为凡人的思想？我怀念。以神性的名义进行的自我牺牲，一定会令人痛苦不已，因为没有痛苦就没有宣泄，没有失去就没有真正的登神。抱歉，虽然我很想说得尽可能简洁，但我没法用更加简洁的语言来描述这个过程。这件事情只有亲身经历，才能真正理解。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «¿Que si tenía miedo. Sí. ¿Que si echo de menos el pasado y mis pensamientos de mortal? También. El autosacrificio en nombre de lo divino debe ser agónico, pues no hay catarsis sin dolor ni apoteosis sin pérdida. Siento no poder expresarlo de forma más sencilla, por mucho que quiera, pero algunas cosas hay que vivirlas para poder comprenderlas».
languages.original_text: "Was I afraid? I was. Have I missed the past and my mortal thoughts? I have. Self-sacrifice in the name of divinity must be agonisingly painful, for no catharsis is possible without pain, and no apotheosis is genuine without loss. Forgive me for not being able to put it in any simpler terms, much as I would like to — this is something one must experience in order to comprehend it."

traits.locale_text: «¿Que si tenía miedo. Sí. ¿Que si echo de menos el pasado y mis pensamientos de mortal? También. El autosacrificio en nombre de lo divino debe ser agónico, pues no hay catarsis sin dolor ni apoteosis sin pérdida. Siento no poder expresarlo de forma más sencilla, por mucho que quiera, pero algunas cosas hay que vivirlas para poder comprenderlas».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「私が恐れていた？そうだった。私が過去や死すべき思いが恋しかった？そうだった。神性の名において自己犠牲を払うことは、苦痛を伴うに違いない。苦痛なくしてカタルシスは得られず、喪失なくして神化はありえない。もっと簡単な言葉で表現することができないことを許し給え…これは、経験しなければ理解できぬことなのだ」
languages.original_text: "Was I afraid? I was. Have I missed the past and my mortal thoughts? I have. Self-sacrifice in the name of divinity must be agonisingly painful, for no catharsis is possible without pain, and no apotheosis is genuine without loss. Forgive me for not being able to put it in any simpler terms, much as I would like to — this is something one must experience in order to comprehend it."

traits.locale_text: 「私が恐れていた？そうだった。私が過去や死すべき思いが恋しかった？そうだった。神性の名において自己犠牲を払うことは、苦痛を伴うに違いない。苦痛なくしてカタルシスは得られず、喪失なくして神化はありえない。もっと簡単な言葉で表現することができないことを許し給え…これは、経験しなければ理解できぬことなのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hatte ich Angst? Ja. Vermisse ich gelegentlich die Vergangenheit und meine sterblichen Gedanken? Ja. Selbstaufopferung im Namen der Göttlichkeit muss quälend schmerzhaft sein, denn ohne Schmerz ist keine Katharsis möglich, ohne Verlust ist keine wahre Apotheose möglich. Verzeiht, dass ich es nicht simpler ausdrücken kann, so gerne ich es auch würde — man muss es selbst erlebe, um es zu verstehen."
languages.original_text: "Was I afraid? I was. Have I missed the past and my mortal thoughts? I have. Self-sacrifice in the name of divinity must be agonisingly painful, for no catharsis is possible without pain, and no apotheosis is genuine without loss. Forgive me for not being able to put it in any simpler terms, much as I would like to — this is something one must experience in order to comprehend it."

traits.locale_text: "Hatte ich Angst? Ja. Vermisse ich gelegentlich die Vergangenheit und meine sterblichen Gedanken? Ja. Selbstaufopferung im Namen der Göttlichkeit muss quälend schmerzhaft sein, denn ohne Schmerz ist keine Katharsis möglich, ohne Verlust ist keine wahre Apotheose möglich. Verzeiht, dass ich es nicht simpler ausdrücken kann, so gerne ich es auch würde — man muss es selbst erlebe, um es zu verstehen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Ai-je eu peur ? Oui. Le passé et mes pensées mortelles me manquent-ils ? Oui. Mais le sacrifice au nom d'une divinité doit être affreusement douloureux, car il n'y a pas de catharsis sans souffrance et pas de véritable apothéose sans perte. Pardonnez-moi de ne pas pouvoir vous donner d'explication plus simple, à mon grand désarroi ; c'est une expérience que l'on ne peut comprendre qu'en la vivant. »
languages.original_text: "Was I afraid? I was. Have I missed the past and my mortal thoughts? I have. Self-sacrifice in the name of divinity must be agonisingly painful, for no catharsis is possible without pain, and no apotheosis is genuine without loss. Forgive me for not being able to put it in any simpler terms, much as I would like to — this is something one must experience in order to comprehend it."

traits.locale_text: « Ai-je eu peur ? Oui. Le passé et mes pensées mortelles me manquent-ils ? Oui. Mais le sacrifice au nom d'une divinité doit être affreusement douloureux, car il n'y a pas de catharsis sans souffrance et pas de véritable apothéose sans perte. Pardonnez-moi de ne pas pouvoir vous donner d'explication plus simple, à mon grand désarroi ; c'est une expérience que l'on ne peut comprendre qu'en la vivant. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Was I afraid? I was. Have I missed the past and my mortal thoughts? I have. Self-sacrifice in the name of divinity must be agonisingly painful, for no catharsis is possible without pain, and no apotheosis is genuine without loss. Forgive me for not being able to put it in any simpler terms, much as I would like to — this is something one must experience in order to comprehend it."

languages.text: "Korktum mu? Evet, korktum. Geçmişimi ve ölümlü düşüncelerimi özledim mi? Evet, özledim. Tanrısallık adına kendini feda etmek zaten kahredici derecede acılı olmalıdır. Sonuçta acısız katarsis mümkün değil, kayıpsız gerçekleşen hiçbir ilahlaşma da gerçek değildir. Ne kadar istesem de daha basit şekilde ifade edemiyorum. Bu, idrak edebilmek için bizzat deneyimlenmesi gereken bir şey."
languages.original_text: "Was I afraid? I was. Have I missed the past and my mortal thoughts? I have. Self-sacrifice in the name of divinity must be agonisingly painful, for no catharsis is possible without pain, and no apotheosis is genuine without loss. Forgive me for not being able to put it in any simpler terms, much as I would like to — this is something one must experience in order to comprehend it."

traits.locale_text: "Korktum mu? Evet, korktum. Geçmişimi ve ölümlü düşüncelerimi özledim mi? Evet, özledim. Tanrısallık adına kendini feda etmek zaten kahredici derecede acılı olmalıdır, sonuçta acı olmadan katarsis mümkün değildir ve kayıp olmadan gerçekleşen hiçbir ilahlaşma gerçek değildir. Ne kadar istesem de daha basit şekilde ifade edemediğim için kusuruma bakma. Bu, kişinin idrak edebilmesi için kendisinin deneyimlemesi gereken bir şey."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
